name: Red Earth Software
tag_list: exchange-server, email-filtering, email-signature, email-disclaimer, email-management, anti-spam, anti-virus, email-security, microsoft-outlook, email-filter, email-archiving, ediscovery, email-policy
overview:
Red Earth Software are developers of email management software for small and medium-sized businesses throughout the world.

Red Earth’s Policy Patrol software family empowers enterprises of all sizes to regulate and optimize their corporate email usage and minimize liability and ensure regulatory compliance. Policy Patrol integrates with Microsoft Exchange Server and provides centralized email disclaimers & email signatures, anti-spam, anti-virus, content filtering, email archiving and email management.

Policy Patrol filters emails for millions of users worldwide in the financial, legal, entertainment, hospitality, healthcare and retail sectors. Red Earth Software is a Microsoft Certified Partner, an HP Business Partner and an Intel Software Partner.

Fully working 30-day trials of Policy Patrol are available for download from the company website.
